item.title: 美国基金在敖德萨谷物码头争端中赢得乌克兰法院支持
item.description: 美国基金 Argentem Creek Partners 和 Innovatus Capital Partners 表示，他们已赢得乌克兰法院的支持，从当地金融家手中夺回了对奥德萨谷物码头运营商的控制权。【原文：US funds Argentem Creek Partners and Innovatus Capital Partners said they have won the support of a Ukrainian court in their bid to wrest control of an Odesa grain terminal operator from local financiers.】

item.title: Trafigura 承认其创始人克劳德-多芬批准了贿赂行为
item.description: 大宗商品交易巨头 Trafigura 集团承认，其创始人兼前首席执行官克劳德-多芬（Claude Dauphin）批准了巴西石油交易中的贿赂行为，这是该行业的一位老板首次卷入美国一系列大范围的腐败案件。【原文：Commodity trading behemoth Trafigura Group has admitted that its founder and former Chief Executive Officer Claude Dauphin approved bribe payments for oil deals in Brazil, the first time one of the industry’s bosses has been implicated in a sweeping series of US corruption cases.】

item.title: 俄罗斯因贸易商纠纷扣押两艘埃及小麦船
item.description: 俄罗斯当局扣押了埃及两艘装载小麦的出口船只，这是一个重要谷物贸易商与农业监管机构之间的国内纠纷阻碍向国外交货的最新迹象。【原文：Russian authorities are holding up two Egyptian ships loaded with wheat for export, in the latest sign that a domestic dispute between a key grain trader and the agriculture regulator is hindering deliveries abroad.】

item.title: 顶级墨西哥比索预测师认为全球反弹势头正在减弱
item.description: 世界上最准确的货币预测机构称，随着墨西哥央行开始降息，世界上最好的货币涨势将趋于平缓。【原文：The world’s best currency rally is set to peter out as Mexico’s central bank begins to cut interest rates, according to the currency’s most-accurate forecaster.】

item.title: 荷兰国际集团金融公司称美国 10 年期收益率将重回 4.5
item.description: 在全球最大的债券市场上，越来越多的人认为，10 年期基准收益率将重新回到 11 月份的 4.5% 水平，当时年底的大涨还没有开始。【原文：In the world’s biggest bond market, there’s a growing sense that the benchmark 10-year yield is set to revisit the 4.5% level last seen in November before a massive year-end rally kicked in.】

item.title: 特鲁多为非营利机构购买公寓楼设立基金
item.description: 贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）总理的政府正在制定一项 15 亿加元（11 亿美元）的计划，以帮助加拿大非营利组织购买可负担得起的公寓楼，并降低租金。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau’s government is creating a C$1.5 billion ($1.1 billion) program to help Canadian nonprofit organizations buy affordable apartment buildings and keep the rents down.】

item.title: 几乎没人做空国债也许他们应该
item.description: 调查数据显示，美国国债的直接空头接近低位。但由于通胀风险导致债券波动性和收益率上升，投资者正在错失良机。【原文：Survey data shows that outright shorts in US Treasuries are near lows. But investors are missing a trick as inflation risks point to higher bond volatility and yields.】

item.title: 津巴布韦新任中央银行行长负责解决 77% 的货币崩溃问题
item.description: 津巴布韦新任央行行长约翰-穆沙亚万胡（John Mushayavanhu）面临着一项艰巨的任务：恢复这个以印制 100 万亿美元钞票和 200% 的利率而非连贯的货币政策著称的机构的公信力。【原文：John Mushayavanhu, Zimbabwe’s new central bank governor, has a gargantuan task ahead of him: restore credibility to an institution better known for printing 100 trillion dollar bills and 200% interest rates than coherent monetary policy.】

item.title: 新研究发现，收费后私人信贷不会带来额外收益
item.description: 三位学者对蓬勃发展的 1.7 万亿美元私人信贷市场提出了一个大胆的看法：在计入额外风险和费用后，该资产类别几乎不会给投资者带来额外回报。【原文：A trio of academics has a bold take on the booming $1.7 trillion private credit market: after accounting for additional risks and fees, the asset class delivers virtually no extra return to investors.】

item.title: 丹麦因训练导弹风险关闭航道
item.description: 丹麦关闭了通往波罗的海的重要航线 "大地带 "的一条航道，警告说附近的一次军事演习可能会造成导弹碎片。【原文：Denmark closed a shipping lane in the Great Belt, a key route to the Baltic Sea, warning of the risk of missile fragments from a nearby military exercise.】

item.title: 新资本规则加速尼日利亚银行整合
item.description: 随着贷方为满足严格的新资本规则而进行合并，尼日利亚的银行队伍将缩小。【原文：Nigeria’s banking ranks are set to shrink as lenders merge in order to meet tough new capital rules.】

item.title: 巴克莱称力拓两地上市折扣是机遇
item.description: 力拓在英国上市的股票与澳大利亚股票相比有很大的折价，巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的分析师说，押注价差缩小可以赚钱。【原文：Rio Tinto’s UK-listed shares are trading at a big discount to its Australian stock, and Barclays Plc analysts say there’s money to be made by betting the spread will narrow.】

item.title: 区域银行撤退，马维克资本募集房地产基金
item.description: Mavik Capital Management LP 正寻求融资 5.15 亿美元，为美国中型市场商业房地产提供融资，由于地区性银行从该领域撤出，该领域受到流动性短缺的困扰。【原文：Mavik Capital Management LP is looking to raise $515 million to finance US middle-market commercial real estate, an area beset by a liquidity shortage as regional banks pull back from the space.】

item.title: 10 年期国债收益率何时对股票有影响？也许在达到 6% 之前不会
item.description:
请记住，奥本海默的斯托尔茨福斯说，股票只有在 5% 的时候才会 "消化不良"

。【原文：

Remember, Oppenheimer’s Stoltzfus says, equities only got ‘indigestion’ at 5%

】

item.title: 泰晤士水务公司更安全债券因国家救援担忧而开始下跌
item.description: 国家拯救泰晤士水务公司的可能性越来越大，这对以前被认为与公用事业公司的困境无关的债务造成了压力。【原文：The growing possibility of a state rescue at Thames Water is weighing on debt that was previously considered to be insulated from the utility company’s woes.】

item.title: 波兰因面临新一轮通胀爆发风险而暂缓加息
在 DS Smith 争夺战中，美国竞购者希望在伦敦二次上市
item.description: 国际纸业公司表示，如果成功赢得以 57 亿英镑（72 亿美元）收购英国竞争对手 DS Smith Plc 的交易，将考虑在伦敦二次上市。【原文：International Paper Co. said it will consider a secondary listing in London if it succeeds in winning the battle to buy UK rival DS Smith Plc for £5.7 billion ($7.2 billion).】

item.title: 智利港口工人举行抗议活动，威胁商品出口
item.description: 周四，智利港口工人举行抗议活动，扰乱了这个从铜、锂到纸浆和水果等原材料的最大出口国之一的船舶装卸工作。【原文：Chilean port workers staged protests on Thursday, disrupting the loading and unloading of ships in one of the biggest exporters of raw materials from copper and lithium to pulp and fruit.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在旧金山和伦敦聘用 Moelis 软件银行家
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）从 Moelis & Co.公司聘请了两位高级软件银行家，以继续其美国投资银行业务的扩张。【原文：Banco Santander SA tapped a pair of senior software bankers from Moelis & Co. as it continues its US investment-banking expansion.】

item.title: KKR 的谢尔顿称市场处于 "信贷分配的黄金时代
item.description: KKR & Co.公司敦促观望的投资者不要再纠结于寻找完美的切入点，而应跳入债市，因为今年预示着 "信贷配置的黄金时代"。【原文：KKR & Co. is urging investors sitting on the sidelines to stop obsessing over finding the perfect entry point and jump into the debt market as this year heralds a “golden age for credit allocation.”】

item.title: 埃及正在洽谈租赁新液化天然气终端，进口量正在增加
item.description: 埃及正计划租赁一个天然气进口终端，同时加大海外采购力度，以避免今年夏天出现能源短缺。【原文：Egypt is planning to lease a natural gas import terminal as it steps up overseas purchases in a bid to avoid energy shortages this summer.】

item.title: 世界粮食计划署称苏丹数百万人面临严重饥饿，援助受阻
item.description: 世界粮食计划署（World Food Programme）表示，战争正在使苏丹的饥饿程度达到创纪录的水平，目前有1800万人正在经历 "严重饥饿"，而向该国运送援助物资也面临挑战。【原文：War is driving hunger to record levels in Sudan, with 18 million people now experiencing “acute hunger” amid challenges bringing aid into the country, the World Food Programme said.】

item.title: 创历史新高的黄金出口推动加拿大贸易顺差扩大
item.description: 受运往瑞士和英国的黄金大幅增加的推动，加拿大的商品贸易收支录得自 10 月份以来的最大盈余。【原文：Canada’s merchandise trade balance recorded its largest surplus since October, driven by a strong increase in gold shipments to Switzerland and the UK.】

item.title: CFA 一级通过率升至 44%，高于历史平均水平
item.description: 特许金融分析师一级考试的通过率跃升至 44%，超过了历史平均水平；不过，已经推迟考试的考生的成功率要低得多。【原文：The pass rate for the first level of the chartered financial analyst exam jumped above its historic average to 44% — though test takers who’d already delayed their exam had a much lower success rate.】

item.title: 摩科瑞与交易商一道进军日本现货电力市场
item.description: 摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.）正准备开始在日本的实物电力市场上进行交易，这是全球大宗商品公司中最新一家试图利用该行业日益加剧的波动性的公司。【原文：Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. is preparing to begin trading in Japan’s physical power market, the latest global commodities firm seeking to capitalize on the sector’s rising volatility.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦大亨侯赛因-达伍德出售煤炭能源业务
item.description: 巴基斯坦商业大亨侯赛因-达伍德（Hussain Dawood）的 Engro 能源公司出售了其煤炭开采和发电业务，该业务在过去五年中一直是该国廉价能源的重要来源。【原文：Pakistani business tycoon Hussain Dawood’s Engro Energy sold its coal mining and power generation business that has been a key source of cheap energy in the nation for the past five years.】

item.title: 马克-安德森和杰夫-维尼克支持加密初创公司新古典资本
item.description: 一对高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）和 BlockTower Capital 的校友成立了一家新的数字资产投资公司，专注于衍生品、现实世界资产代币化、娱乐、游戏和社交等领域。【原文：A pair of Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and BlockTower Capital alumni have launched a new digital-asset investment firm focusing on areas including derivatives, tokenization of real-world assets, entertainment, gaming and social.】

item.title: 杰富瑞与日本三井住友将联盟扩展至加拿大
item.description: 日本最大的银行之一三井住友金融集团正在深化与杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc., one of Japan’s largest banks, is deepening an alliance with Jefferies Financial Group Inc., with the two companies announcing plans to work together on corporate and investment banking deals in the Canadian market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员认为上月降息理由增强
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）最近一次政策会议的报告显示，该行官员上个月看到了足够令人信服的证据，从而得出结论认为，降息的时机已经来临。【原文：European Central Bank officials saw enough convincing evidence last month to conclude that the time for interest-rate cuts has almost arrived, an account of their latest policy meeting showed.】

item.title: 印度央行将外汇套期保值规则实施时间推迟至 5 月 3 日
item.description: 印度央行将其关于交易所交易货币衍生品规则的实施时间推迟了约一个月，此前该措施在市场上引发了恐慌，因为交易员们试图平掉未对冲的头寸。【原文：India’s central bank pushed back the implementation of its rules on exchange-traded currency derivatives by about a month, after the measure triggered panic in the market as traders tried to square off unhedged positions.】
